manual.title: man
manual.abstract: This manual explains the usage of the "man" command and how to read and interpret vCommand manuals.

section.title: Command Parameters
section.body: Hodor, hodor hodor hodor, hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor. Hodor hodor hodor hodor, hodor hodor Hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor, hodor Hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor. Hodor Hodor, hodor, hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor hodor.
